p: When the absolute humidity was taken as the exposed factor, the RS values showed that the change of absolute humidity produced an effect on all the nine infectious diseases, including dysentery, HFM, hepatitis A, hemorrhagic fever, typhoid fever, malaria, meningitis, influenza and schistosomiasis, in more than 50% of the effective counties in Anhui province. 95% of the effective counties experienced different sensitivities to dysentery and HFM to absolute humidity at two different climate statuses in the exposure and non-exposure groups.
